actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Senate Committee on Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.

actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill authorizing appropriations to the Executive Director, United States Holocaust Memorial Council, for services necessary to perform the functions of the United States Holocaust Memorial Council.

summary.text: Amends the Holocaust Memorial Council Act to authorize appropriations for FY 1984.
